column5: Hi Folks,  Wondering if someone could help find a location on Sturgeon. Locals call it crows nest ( I assume this describes a shoreline reference point)  and it is on south shorline somewhere west of emily creek.  Any help with location tips greatly appreciated.  Thanks
I have lived on Sturgeon Lake for 12 years now and I have never heard of it, I would be interested in knowing too.
Theres an eagles nest on the south shore never heard of acrows nest
Hmm maybe I heard incorrectly and it is an eagles nest. Where exactly is that?  Thanks for the help.
Never heard of it either....  S.
There's eagles in the Kawarthas??  Yup, and there's getting to be quite a few of them Simon.  Took this picture from my back deck.
Nice eagle pics Lew. What areas will you see them
Most of the ones I see are around Lake Katchawanooka, Clear Lake & the Burliegh falls area.
Thanks Lew. I will look for them when I am around the falls. I didn't know they were in the area
